page.title: 10 THE LITTLE CHEF
page.content: On the outskirts of the residential area called Balgillo there is a Little Chef Restaurant.This restarant is part of a national chain which has over 240 restaurants all over the country.This restaurant has three management and four ordinary staff and they think they are well paid 350 people use this Little Chef every day but their busiest days are Saturday and Sunday.Most of the customers are families and business people.The customers can sit-in to eat or take out their food.There are no plans for any changes to the restaurant in the near future.This Little Chef has been opened since December 1974.
